==Latest Media Playable==
Buttons controls are now available for skinners that want to make the latest media clickable (playable).

Playing support exists for;
  * music
  * moving pictures
  * tvseries
  * tv recordings (4therecord or mp)

===Button Ids===
||91919991||Moving Picture, first movie||
||91919992||Moving Picture, second movie||
||91919993||Moving Picture, third movie||
||91919994||TVSeries, first episode||
||91919995||TVSeries, second episode||
||91919996||TVSeries, third episode||
||91919997||Music, first album||
||91919998||Music, second album||
||91919999||Music, third album||
||91919984||TV Recording, first recording||
||91919985||TV Recording, second recording||
||91919986||TV Recording, third recording||

===Example Button (Play First Moving Picture Movie)===
{{{
<control>
        <description>Play Button</description>
        <type>button</type>
        <id>91919991</id>
        <posX>790</posX>
        <posY>484</posY>
        <width>148</width>
        <height>207</height>
        <textureFocus>poster_frame_rounder_corners_play.png</textureFocus>
        <textureNoFocus>poster_frame_rounder_corners.png</textureNoFocus>
        <label>-</label>
        <onleft>91919993</onleft>
        <onright>91919992</onright>
        <onup>61703</onup>
        <font>font12</font>
        <animation effect="fade" time="800" reversible="true">VisibleChange</animation>
        <animation effect="fade" start="100" end="0" time="350">WindowClose</animation>	
        <animation effect="slide" start="0,0" end="800,0" tween="quadratic" easing="in" time="350">Hidden</animation>
        <visible allowhiddenfocus="true">[Control.HasFocus(91919991)|Control.HasFocus(91919992)|Control.HasFocus(91919993)]|[Control.isvisible(98345611)+[Control.HasFocus(61703)|Control.HasFocus(61803)|Control.HasFocus(61704)|Control.HasFocus(61804)]]</visible>
    </control>
}}}
